t: How to list a brand new item that has damaged package?
s: I’ve been assuming that “Used-Like New” (with a note something like “Brand new product, minor package damage”) would be acceptable to use for a brand new item that has minor damage to outside packaging. But, after looking at the condition guidelines, that doesn’t seem to be the case.

t: Brand Stores: Create a brand page on Amazon for free | Amazon Ads
s: Brand Stores help build brand awareness by showcasing your brand and product catalog on your own Amazon web address. You can create a Brand Store at no additional cost—with no coding necessary.

t: VFAUOSIT Brand Kitchen Faucets Recalled Due to Dangerous Lead Exposure for Young Children; Sold on Amazon.com by Whisper08 | CPSC.gov
s: Consumers should immediately stop using these faucets and contact Whisper08 about disposal and a refund. s: Sponsored ads on Amazon help build your brand and drive sales. Invest in long-term business growth by advertising your brand and products on Amazon.

t: Returns and Replacements - FAQ - Amazon Customer Service
s: Products that are physically damaged, defective, has missing parts, or are different from their description in the product details page are eligible for return. You may also return products if you there is a change of mind and you do not wish to keep the item with you.

t: Box Arrived Damaged, But Product Was Okay
s: This page works best with JavaScript. Disabling it will result in some disabled or missing features. You can still see all customer reviews for the product · I was disappointed as the box arrived with big holes in it. This isn't a seller issue, but a quality error with Amazon.

t: What You Must Know About Amazon Brand Protection
s: October 4, 2024 - Here are seven of the biggest pitfalls of neglecting Amazon brand protection. #1 Counterfeit chaos: One of the most immediate and damaging consequences of lacking Amazon brand protection is the proliferation of counterfeit products leveraging your brand’s name.

t: Damaged or Defective Item - Amazon Customer Service
s: All our products go through intense quality check before they are shipped. However, in rare instances a product may get damaged during transit. Read below for Frequently Asked Questions about damaged or defective products.

t: Brand damage for Amazon and a triumph for old media | David Benigson | The Guardian
s: May 31, 2017 - What’s more damaging to a brand? Online chatter that shows up negative in sentiment analysis, or further negative news articles recommending a boycott of the company, which may spark wider antipathy? The controversy around Amazon’s working culture has this week overshadowed a deal supposedly worth £160m. That is the reported amount Amazon Prime is paying to produce a car show starring Top ...

t: Amazon.com: That Says Damaged Tank Top : Clothing, Shoes & Jewelry

s: I have three items sold, and then after one or two weeks, Amazon informed me that two of them were marked as ''Customer Damaged'' and one as " Defective''. Here is the thing: Swear to god, the three items were freaking brand new when I shipped them to Amazon.
